original_text: and over those who did the work of the field for tilling the soil was Ezri the son of Chelub;
korean_text: 글룹의 아들 에스리는 밭 가는 농민을 거느렸고

sentences.original_text: and over those who did the work of the field for tilling the soil
sentences.korean_translation: 땅을 경작하는 밭의 일꾼들을 관리한 사람은

sentences.original_text: was Ezri the son of Chelub
